about.title: ABOUT HOUTS BAG
about.subtitle: Your lifestyle. Limitless
about.desc: The versatile vegan Apple Leather bag that goes from a comfortable backpack to a handbag that supports your active lifestyle.

backsideTopPocket.title: BACKSIDE: TOP POCKET
backsideTopPocket.text:
The top pocket is ideal for items you need quick access to, such as your phone, passport, or keys. Its convenient location and spacious interior make it perfect for storing essentials on the go. 

 The pocket's secure closure keeps your belongings safe, while the sleek design maintains the bag's sophisticated appearance.

luggageStrap.title: LUGGAGE STRAP
luggageStrap.text:
Our bag includes a durable luggage strap, making it easy to secure to your rolling suitcase. 

 This convenient feature boosts mobility and simplifies travel, ensuring a seamless journey wherever you go.

backsideBottomPocket.title: BACKSIDE: BOTTOM POCKET
backsideBottomPocket.text:
The bottom pocket provides additional storage for your daily necessities. Whether you need to carry cables, a small notebook, or personal items, this pocket offers ample space and easy accessibility. 

 The durable zipper ensures your items stay securely in place, making it a practical addition to this stylish bag.

minimalistDesign.title: MINIMALIST DESIGN
minimalistDesign.text:
Embrace the elegance of simplicity with this bag's minimalist design. Clean lines, subtle details, and a focus on functionality make this bag a perfect choice for those who appreciate understated sophistication. 

 The minimalist approach ensures that the bag remains timeless and versatile, suitable for any occasion.

frontSidePocket.title: FRONTSIDE: POCKET
frontSidePocket.text:
The frontside pocket is a versatile compartment that offers extra room for your belongings. It's perfect for storing items that you need to access frequently throughout the day for example Bag Straps. 

 The pocket's streamlined design seamlessly integrates with the bag's overall aesthetic, adding both functionality and style.

functionality.title: FUNCTIONALITY
functionality.desc:
The modular bag 2-in-1 seamlessly transitions between a backpack
              and a shoulder bag, offering unparalleled versatility for dynamic
              lifestyles. Its innovative design allows easy conversion with
              detachable straps and secure compartments, catering to both casual
              and professional needs. This adaptable accessory ensures
              practicality and style, making it ideal for active professionals,
              travelers, and fashion-forward individuals.
functionality.desc2: When space runs out, our modular bag's innovative expandable compartment has your back. With just a simple unzip, it transforms, offering up to 67% more storage capacity. Whether you’re carrying extra gear for work or packing essentials for a weekend getaway, this bag adjusts to your needs effortlessly. No more struggling to fit in those last-minute items—expand, store, and go with confidence. Designed for the dynamic individual, this adaptable feature ensures that you’re always ready, no matter how much you need to carry.
functionality.subtitle: TWO BAGS IN

compact.title: COMPACT AND SECURE DOCUMENT SLEEVE
compact.desc:
This sleek document sleeve provides excellent protection for your important papers.

Made from durable materials, it fits easily into your briefcase or backpack. The secure design keeps your documents in place and prevents creases. Perfect for professionals on the go.

versatile.title: VERSATILE AND DURABLE CARRY CASE
versatile.desc:
This carry case offers ample space for documents, tablets, and laptops.

Its sturdy exterior, reinforced zippers, and durable padding inside the pockets provide reliable protection for your electronics and other belongings. Ideal for everyday use and travel.

inside.title: ORGANIZED AND READY TO GO
inside.desc:
This travel suitcase part showcases a well-organized packing layout with neatly folded clothes. The compact design helps you maximize space while keeping your garments wrinkle-free and easily accessible. Featuring different compartments, it ensures every item has its place. 

Perfect for short trips or extended travel, this packing method saves time and minimizes hassle. The suitcase accommodates various clothing types and fits effortlessly into overhead compartments or car trunks.

instant.title: INSTANT VERTICAL LAPTOP ACCESS
instant.desc:
Our design allows you to quickly and effortlessly retrieve your laptop from a standing position without having to dig through other contents or lay the bag flat. 

Perfect for tight spaces like   security lines or busy coffee shops, this feature enhances convenience and saves time, making your travel and work transitions smoother and more efficient.

luggage.title: LUGGAGE STRAP
luggage.desc:
Our bag includes a durable luggage strap, making it easy to secure to your rolling suitcase. 

This convenient feature boosts mobility and simplifies travel, ensuring a seamless journey wherever you go.

options.title: APPLE LEATHER
options.desc:
Our bags are crafted from eco-friendly apple leather, offering
                  durability and a luxurious finish while supporting
                  sustainability in fashion. Stylish and versatile, they are
                  perfect for conscious consumers seeking responsible fashion
                  choices without compromising on quality or aesthetics.
options.desc1:
A bag that represents you: Designed to be more than just a
                  carrier for your essentials, this bag serves as a personal
                  statement, reflecting your unique style and identity. Perfect
                  for making a lasting impression wherever you go.
options.desc2:
Design of the 2-in-1 bag enables swift transformation from a
                  shoulder bag to a backpack with ease. This adaptability makes
                  it an ideal choice for those who value flexibility and
                  functionality in their everyday carry, ensuring it meets a
                  range of preferences and situations with ease.

socialProof.title: SOCIAL PROOF
socialProof.desc: Showcased at prestigious events like ILM Offenbach and Thincubator, our 2-in-1 bag has garnered acclaim for its innovative design and versatility. It has received positive feedback from both industry experts and consumers, establishing itself as a standout product. These showcases have significantly enhanced its credibility and appeal in the competitive fashion and accessory market, making it a favored choice among discerning customers looking for both style and functionality.

col.title: ILM OFFENBACH 2024
col.desc:
We took our bite from ILM Offenbach. It was a huge deal for
                    us! We got to show off our vegan apple leather bags for the
                    first time, and honestly, we're still riding that high.

col1.title: THINCUBATOR 2024
col1.desc:
Being a part of thincubator by thinc! was an incredible
                    experience! Over two weeks, alongside 40 other young startup
                    enthusiasts, we dedicated ourselves to our projects.

journey.title: OUR STORY & JOURNEY
journey.desc:
We are the founders of Houts, 2 energetic young people
                passionate about the idea of combining a lifestyle and
                sustainability in one punch. Be part of our community and make
                your lifestyle limitless.

journey.title: FIRST ITERATIONS & SKETCHES
journey.desc: On an evening walk with a coffee, Alex and I discussed the first ideas and visions of the bag. The first steps were taken in August 2021.

journey1.title: FIRST PROTOTYPES
journey1.desc: After a year of work on the project, sketches, market analysis, the search for manufacturers, we started the manufacture of the first prototype.

journey2.title: PREPARING THE MARKETING STRATEGY & THE FINAL PROTOTYPE
journey2.desc: Dozens of prototypes, but finally we reached the end of this chapter. It's time to create a marketing and promotion strategy.

journey3.title: CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN
journey3.desc: The last stage was of course the Crowdfunding campaign. It always seemed like a distant point for us, but forget that we also reached the final stage.

works.title: APPLE LEATHER? HOW IT WORKS?
works.desc:
Our bags, crafted from USDA-certified vegan ,,apple" leather
                  using remnants from juice production, exemplify your
                  commitment to circular fashion, seam­lessly blending
                  sustainability with timeless elegance.

item.title: IT ALL STARTED WITH AN APPLE
item.desc: The “vegan” leather we use in our bags was once an apple growing on a tree

item1.title: JUICE PRODUCTION
item1.desc: The fruit is not directly used in the production of the leather like material. The apples come mostly from the production of apple juice

item2.title: APPLE RESIDUAL
item2.desc: We take this leftover apple pulp and turn it into a durable, eco-friendly material that looks and feels like leather

item3.title: “VEGAN” LEATHER
item3.desc: The remaining apple pulp and residues are pressed and dyed to form the material used in our bags

item4.title: UPCYCLED ECOLOGICAL BAGS
item4.desc: Here is the start your commitment to circular fashion, seamlessly blending sustainability with timeless elegance

sustainability.title: SUSTAINABILITY
sustainability.desc:
For every Houts product, we plant one tree to do our bit for the
              environment. Join us on our mission to restore forests across the
              world.
sustainability.subtitle: Follow our journey on:

col.title: GOING BEYOND NEUTRAL: OUR COMMITMENT TO A POSITIVE IMPACT
col.desc:
At Houts, we believe that being carbon neutral, which means
                  simply balancing the environmental harm we might cause, isn't
                  enough. We see it as merely staying afloat. Instead, we
                  challenge ourselves to consider every action through a clear
                  lens: Does it have a negative, neutral, or positive impact on
                  the climate?
col.desc1:
That's why we go further. We don't just aim to offset our
                  carbon footprint; we commit to offsetting 110% of it. But we
                  don’t stop there—we also take active steps to restore
                  ecosystems that have been harmed by the widespread use of
                  single-use paper and plastic. By adopting this approach, we
                  ensure that every Houts product not only minimizes damage but
                  actually contributes positively to our planet’s health.

col1.desc:
Every year, we meticulously measure and offset 100% of our
                  carbon footprint in partnership with
                  OneTreePlanted while continuously working to
                  reduce our emissions annually. But at Houts, we believe in
                  doing more than just breaking even with the environment.
col1.desc1:
We commit to offsetting at least 10% more carbon than we emit,
                  ensuring that our impact is not just neutral but net
                  positive—actively benefiting the climate.

footer.title: SUPPORT US
footer.desc:
on all Social Media platforms and follow the path to the launch of
            Houts!
